blocks.content:
Built for You Contracting makes updating and repairing your home's exterior or interior a breeze, because the work is built for you!

If you peer up at your ceiling at night wondering if rain will get in, then you know the stress that comes from a home in disrepair.

> ## 🌧 🤷‍♂️
>
> Worried about rain getting in?

Your stress can be relieved easier than you think. Send us a [message](/contact) and Built for You Contracting will solve your problems so you can sleep easier.

## Why Choose Built for You?

When you look for home repairs, you don't want someone who promises the moon but fails to deliver.

At the same time, you want a contractor who aim for the very best.

This is your home we're talking about, after all.

Built for You Contracting is your reliable, expert solution. We get the job done right, every time. That's why our slogan is:

> Built Right, Built for You!

## Our Story

William Lee worked in renovations and for roofing companies for many years before taking the plunge and starting his own contracting business.

It's always easier to work for somebody else, but being the captain of your own ship comes with a sense of pride and accomplishment like nothing else.

Built for You Contracting stands firm on our high quality work and results that clients love.

## What We Offer

If you want to learn more about the kinds of work we provide, check out our [services](/services) page.

We want to hear from you with any questions or queries you might have. We are happy to provide estimates and plan with you depending on your specific needs.

Get in touch with us at our [contact](/contact) page.

## Special Offer for You

If you're reading this, we're thrilled that you're getting to know us here at Built for You.

Please mention you saw our website and this offer, and we'll include a $20 gift card as a follow up to any completed job. This is just our way of saying thank you for being a great client.

We look forward to hearing from you today!
